BT.models

Class DrawingPaneModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.models.DrawingPaneModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CDDrawingPane, PNDrawingPane, UCDrawingPane

    public class DrawingPaneModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model for drawing pane. This class holds drawed places and new line, if any is being drawn.
    Author:
    Karel Hala
